Reviews.Title: Canon T3 camera package with two lenses (18-55 and 55-250).
Reviews.Author: Philip S. Peterson
Reviews.Content: Canon T3 camera package with two lenses (18-55 and 55-250). Very easy to use camera and lot of extras in the package.

Reviews.Title: canon eos
Reviews.Author: grandma's daycare
Reviews.Content: i love the camera  the pictures are great.  i like the action shot setting  when i take kids on field trips i can get so many good pictures of them playing

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Reble
Reviews.Author: Loraine A. Barry
Reviews.Content: Yes I love it, so easy to use and well worth the investment. Thank-you!  Also it was very easy to purchase through Amazom!!!!

Reviews.Title: What Can I Say About Cannon PERFECTION?
Reviews.Author: You Dress Girl! "Dress Diva!"
Reviews.Content: I HAVEN'T BEGAIN TO DISCOVER THE CAPABILITIES of THIS CAMERA! 'I understand it's beyond my level, but I'm sure I will grow to meet it's abilities!So, I will say no more about the camera.
